key.name: fade-duration
key.description: How long the trail takes to fade out in milliseconds

key.name: line-width
key.description: Thickness of the mouse trail line

key.name: color
key.description: Color of the mouse trail as RGB values

key.name: alpha
key.description: Transparency level of the mouse trail (0.0 = transparent, 1.0 = opaque)

key.name: render-mode
key.description: Rendering mode for the mouse trail: "precise" for segmented smooth curves, "balance" for unified smooth curves, or "fast" for simple lines
